mapper.sql: id, code, name, temperature_value, electric_box_id, is_online ,type_id, del_tag
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(p.name,c.name,a.name,eb.address) as address ,eb.name as name " + "FROM province p ,city c ,AREA a ,orginazation o ,electric_box eb " + "WHERE p.id = c.province_id AND c.id = a.city_id AND a.id = o.`area_id` " + "AND o.`id` = eb.org_id AND eb.id = #{electricBoxId}
mapper.insert: insert into device (id, code, name, temperature_value, electric_box_id, is_oneline ,type_id, del_tag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{electricBoxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOnline ,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delTag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into device
id,
code,
name,
temperature_value,
electric_box_id,
is_online,
type_id,
del_tag,

mapper.update:
update device
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperature_value = #{temperatureValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
electric_box_id = #{electricBoxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_online = #{isOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_tag = #{delTag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update device set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperature_value = #{temperatureValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electric_box_id = #{electricBoxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_online = #{isOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_tag = #{delTag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
